case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_address_found_1: Il State Rte 3 at Main Street
case_circumstances: IDOT workers discovered human skeletal remains in a creek bed adjacent to Illinois State Route 3 in Columbia, Illinois.  Clothing found at the recovery site included a green jersey type shirt with the letter "M" and "Mavericks" on the front (size XL), khaki shorts (size 3), and a brown leather belt with a silver buckle.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
